meta_description: Boscobel is an esteemed Historic House Museum with unparalleled views of the Hudson containing one of the finest collections of decorative arts and furniture from the Federal period.
hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

## Hours

#### **Gardens and Grounds:**

Friday-Sunday | 9am-6pm | Admission Required

Starting December 19th: Saturdays and Sundays

#### **Historic House Museum “Insider” Tours:**

Friday-Sunday | 10am; 12pm; 2pm; 4pm | Grounds admission included with Guided House Tour ticket.

[Learn more about our ongoing restoration and how you can support.](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114015857/https://www.boscobel.org/boscobel-emergency-restoration/)

[Click here for more information and tickets.](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114015857/https://www.boscobel.org/events/pip-house-tours/)

## Admissions

Gardens and Grounds 

House, Gardens and Grounds 

Members 

Gardens and Grounds:

[Members come FREE.](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114015857/https://www.boscobel.org/get-involved/#membership)

House, Gardens and Grounds :

Free for Members at the Partner Level ($150) and above.

* * *

Adult 

Gardens and Grounds:

[$14](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114015857/https://www.boscobel.org/events/gardens-and-grounds-admission/)

House, Gardens and Grounds :

[$24 (Seniors $21)](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114015857/https://90304.blackbaudhosting.com/90304/page.aspx?pid=213&tab=2&txobjid=a7c017d8-9095-4dc8-8add-e423e8b4a198)

* * *

Child (4 - 18 years old) 

Gardens and Grounds:

[$7](http://web.archive.org/web/20251114015857/https://www.boscobel.org/events/gardens-and-grounds-admission/)

House, Gardens and Grounds :

[$13](http://web.archive.org/web/202511...

collections_text:
# Your Home on the Hudson

[Plan Your Visit](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113215603/https://www.boscobel.org/visit/)

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113215603/https://www.boscobel.org/events/pip-house-tours/)

## [Insider House Tours: A Jane Austen Winter  
Saturdays & Sundays](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113215603/https://www.boscobel.org/events/pip-house-tours/)

Experience Boscobel like never before with a special Jane Austen twist to commemorate the author’s 250th birthday.

[Read More](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113215603/https://www.boscobel.org/events/pip-house-tours/)

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113215603/https://www.boscobel.org/events/member-event-tour-of-the-winter-show-panel-discussion/)

## [Member Event: Insider's Tour of The Winter Show  
January 23rd](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113215603/https://www.boscobel.org/events/member-event-tour-of-the-winter-show-panel-discussion/)

Step inside one of the nation’s premier art, antiques, and design fairs for a private, expert-led tour.

[Read More](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113215603/https://www.boscobel.org/events/member-event-tour-of-the-winter-show-panel-discussion/)

[ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113215603/https://www.boscobel.org/events/curators-choice-tour-of-the-american-folk-art-museum/)
